author: iarspider
body:
Closes #42625 

#### PR description:

Fixes maybe-uninitialized warning in MeasurementTrackerImpl::addPhase2Det  as suggested by @makortel in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42625#issuecomment-1688340530 . 

#### PR validation:

Local build
title: Fix maybe-uninitialized warning in MeasurementTrackerImpl::addPhase2Det
